welcomeHeadline: Welcome to SharpCodeLabs – Scalable Web Apps. Real Results.
intro.bio: My name is Youssef, I’m 26 years old and an IT developer with a deep passion for building things that actually work. What started as curiosity for how digital systems operate quickly turned into a drive to create real solutions through clean, functional code. I love the technical challenge — but even more, I love seeing an idea come to life and make an impact. For me, every line of code is a step closer to a smoother, smarter, more efficient experience.
saasDescription: I build scalable, component-based frontends and integrate powerful APIs to support your SaaS growth.
documentationDescription: Clear, structured documentation that makes your product easier to adopt - for users and developers alike.
appsDescription: Fast-loading, cross-platform apps that feel native and work seamlessly on all devices.
bookingDescription: Custom booking systems, payment flows, and funnels designed to help you sell, convert and automate.
portalsDescription: Smart client portals and internal tools that save you time and simplify your workflow.
mvpDescription: I help you launch fast with reliable MVPs - built to validate, iterate and scale with confidence.
school: AP University of Applied Sciences Antwerp
aboutDescription: Creative problem-solver. Clean code enthusiast. I'm Youssef, a developer driven by challenge and simplicity. Whether it's a booking system or a mobile app, I turn complex ideas into seamless digital experiences that work.
skills.title: My Skills

skillsList.frontend: Vue.js, Ember.js, Angular, React, React Native, JavaScript, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap, HTML, CSS

services.title: My Services
experiences.title: My Experiences
bookingDescriptionLong: Developed a full-featured booking platform with secure login, admin dashboard, and real-time reservation flow for services like saunas and wedding decorators.
mediaDescription: Created a media asset platform using Vue.js and GraphQL, allowing enterprise users to upload, tag, and retrieve digital files quickly and efficiently.
agencyDescription: Built a decentralized portal where municipalities can manage local data securely and autonomously, reducing administrative complexity and delay.
automationDescription: Automated Cypress tests for seat selection to streamline releases, boost coverage, and ensure consistent, stable performance across updates.
iiifDescription: Built a research prototype using Vue.js and IIIF to enable users to annotate images interactively and tag specific regions within digital archives.
clientAppDescription: Designed a mobile app for clients to browse, book, and manage appointments, with a smooth and intuitive interface for responsive on-the-go usage.
contactDescription: Whether you have a project in mind, a question about my work, or just want to say hello — I'm always open to connecting. I specialize in building scalable, modern web and mobile applications with a strong focus on performance and user experience. Let's build something great together.

testimonial.1: Youssef delivered exactly what I needed — a fast, responsive, and modern web app. Communication was smooth and the quality of code exceeded expectations!
testimonial.2: Super impressed with the way he handled our project. From planning to delivery, everything was on point. Highly recommended for any serious development work.
testimonial.3: Not only did he build a stunning mobile interface, but he also optimized the performance beyond what we expected. Our users love the new version
testimonial.4: Reliable, fast, and very skilled. Youssef took care of both frontend and backend flawlessly. We’ll definitely work with him again
testimonial.5: The automation testing setup he built saved us hours of manual QA. Clean structure, great documentation, and helpful support throughout
testimonial.6: From start to finish, it was a professional experience. His understanding of full-stack development is impressive and it shows in the final result
